content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position (61.0, -52.0) and (63.0, -52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0) and furnace at position (63.0, -52.0)
- Both furnaces are currently operational, smelting copper ore into copper plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough space to accept the items before attempting to insert them.
- Verify that the furnace has the required ingredients to operate; if it shows "no ingredients to smelt," it indicates a lack of necessary materials.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Make sure to approach the resource node directly before attempting to harvest to avoid any distance-related issues.

### Repeated actions
- Avoid repetitive actions without checking the status of the entities involved, as this can lead to unnecessary errors or inefficiencies.
